timeline.bodyText: Why are we implementing separate methods here ? Also probably this should be a separate PR.

replies.bodyText: I removed this improvement from this PR.

timeline.bodyText: I suggest moving changes to credentials to a separate PR since this seems to be unrelated to x-lang changes.

replies.bodyText: I removed this improvement from this PR and I will prepare separate PR.

timeline.bodyText: Probably just leave this in the package "org.apache.beam.sdk.io.snowflake" ? Is there a need to add a new package ? (and if so probably use long form "crosslanguage").
